column4: Is the iso for install Ubuntu and live cd too ?  I am trying to get Ubuntu 8.10
sound a bit funny ,but I am  stoked to see nautilus have tabbing .  about time
tabbing in nautilus is just pointless for us spatial users though :p
if It use it as well as Konqueor .  It had that great filter feature view .  File size view was great with it too.
yeah konqueror is sexy but I like my minimal spatial browser
nautilus is supposed to be minimal and clean.. dont bog it down with unneeded "features/bloat" I would happily switch over to kde if I needed those things... leave nautilus alone ;(
gnome is gnome kde is kde

they are bother linux gui .  innovation is great for us all.  Political different should not get in the way of getting better.  Take KDE porting it app building frame work to windows and with it goes some of the apps.
I can't wait until I here someone windows person use some app that was on kde/linux first and be like that is cool.  I would say I know been using it for years.
VLC is one thing I have seen my windows friends started using and telling how cool it is.   Not some codec pack like megacodec pack .
yeah it really solved a lot of headaches
Just good software getting to all windows and mac bothers. Make it about the software not os .
yeah but the GNU/Linux OS is the main delight
I mean your talking to guy that reads config and can't stop smiling .   I love the idea behind it.   This laptop don't have anything ,but Linux working now. Not looked back
sorry to sound like a nag :P but use the offtopic :D
